top_stories.title: Nimble raises $47M to give AI agents access to real-time web data
top_stories.description: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database.
top_stories.author: Ram Iyer
top_stories.content: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database.

top_stories.title: AI meets HR: Transforming talent acquisition with Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: In this post, we show how to create an AI-powered recruitment system using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, AWS Lambda, and other AWS services to enhance job description creation, candidate communication, and interview preparation while maintaining human oversight.
top_stories.author: Dola Adesanya
top_stories.content: In this post, we show how to create an AI-powered recruitment system using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, AWS Lambda, and other AWS services to enhance job description creation, candidate communication, and interview preparation while maintaining human oversight.

top_stories.title: Why a 12-year-old forecasting paper has stood the test of time
top_stories.description: Amazon Scholar Aravind Srinivasan coauthored a 2014 paper about forecasting civil unrest in Latin America, which won a test-of-time award at KDD 2025.
top_stories.author: Larry Hardesty
top_stories.content: Amazon Scholar Aravind Srinivasan coauthored a 2014 paper about forecasting civil unrest in Latin America, which won a test-of-time award at KDD 2025.

top_stories.title: Beyond Simple API Requests: How OpenAI’s WebSocket Mode Changes the Game for Low Latency Voice Powered AI Experiences
top_stories.description: In the world of Generative AI, latency is the ultimate killer of immersion. Until recently, building a voice-enabled AI agent felt like assembling a Rube Goldberg machine: you’d pipe audio to a Speech-to-Text (STT) model, send the transcript to a Large Language Model (LLM), and finally shuttle text to a Text-to-Speech (TTS) engine. Each hop […] The post Beyond Simple API Requests: How OpenAI’s WebSocket Mode Changes the Game for Low Latency Voice Powered AI Experiences appeared first on...
top_stories.author: Michal Sutter
top_stories.content: In the world of Generative AI, latency is the ultimate killer of immersion. Until recently, building a voice-enabled AI agent felt like assembling a Rube Goldberg machine: you’d pipe audio to a Speech-to-Text (STT) model, send the transcript to a Large Language Model (LLM), and finally shuttle text to a Text-to-Speech (TTS) engine. top_stories.title: Agentic AI with multi-model framework using Hugging Face smolagents on AWS
top_stories.description: Hugging Face smolagents is an open source Python library designed to make it straightforward to build and run agents using a few lines of code. We will show you how to build an agentic AI solution by integrating Hugging Face smolagents with Amazon Web Services (AWS) managed services. You'll learn how to deploy a healthcare AI agent that demonstrates multi-model deployment options, vector-enhanced knowledge retrieval, and clinical decision support capabilities.
top_stories.author: Sanhita Sarkar
top_stories.content: Hugging Face smolagents is an open source Python library designed to make it straightforward to build and run agents using a few lines of code. We will show you how to build an agentic AI solution by integrating Hugging Face smolagents with Amazon Web Services (AWS) managed services. You'll learn how to deploy a healthcare AI agent that demonstrates multi-model deployment options, vector-enhanced knowledge retrieval, and clinical decision support capabilities.
